content: jimmy does knitting __________________________________________________________________________ troy boy beanie 1 pattern story i wanted a simple 1x1 ribbed beanie in a dk weight yarn but could not find one i liked so i made the troy boy beanie it is a continuation of my troy boy pattern series because it is a very basic knit much like the basic troy boy skills needed this is an advanced beginner pattern cast on knit purl decreasing in pattern yarn west wool tandem 100g 233m / 254 yds sample uses norway for the long version and dijon for the short gauge & needles 31 sts x 35 row over 10cm / 4in in 1x1 rib the recommended needles are 3mm / us 2 5 with a 40cm / 16in circular cable or dpn s recommended notions ● one removable stitch marker ● tapestry needle ● double pointed needles or a longer cord for magic loop finished measurements both versions have a circumference of 47cm / 18 5in long total height 26cm / 10 25in short total height 21cm / 8 25in fits head circumference of 51-59 cm / 20-23 in pattern notes this is knitted in one piece in the round from brim to top 2 instructions cast-on co 144 stitches using your round 13 *k1 p1 k1 k2tog p1* preferred method for 1x1 ribbing repeat from * - * until bor marker for this project it s recommended to use the italian tubular cast-on round 14 knit the knits and purl the or a german twisted cast-on purls place bor marker and join in the round 15 *k1 p1 k2tog p1* repeat round from * - * until bor marker ribbing round 16 knit the knits and purl the work 1x1 rib *k1 p1* purls long version continue knitting in round 17 *k1 k2tog p1* repeat 1x1 rib until piece measures 20cm / from * - * until bor marker 8in from co edge round 18 knit the knits and purl the short version continue knitting in purls 1x1 rib until piece measures 15cm / 6in from co edge round 19 *k2tog p1* repeat from * - * until bor marker needles pull tight and tuck the stitch to the interior of the hat rnds 2-8 knit in 1x1 ribbing round 9 *k2tog p1 k1 ssp* repeat finishing from * - * until bor marker weave in all ends rnds 10-12 knit the knits and purl the purls 3 abbreviations bor beginning of round co cast on k knit k2tog knit two together 1 st decreased m marker p purl p2tog purl two together 1 st decreased round round sm slip marker ssk slip slip knit 1 st decreased ssp slip
